alert.note: Alert for Grant (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 07 at 4:37PM CDT until May 12 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Minnesota...Wisconsin... Mississippi River at La Crosse affecting Houston, Vernon and La Crosse Counties. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Iowa... Wisconsin...Minnesota... Mississippi River at Guttenberg Dam 10 affecting Clayton and Grant Counties. Mississippi River at McGregor affecting Clayton, Allamakee, Grant and Crawford Counties. Mississippi River at Wabasha affecting Wabasha and Buffalo Counties. ...The Flood Warning is cancelled for the following rivers in Minnesota...Wisconsin... Mississippi River at Winona affecting Buffalo, Winona and Trempealeau Counties. .The Mississippi River continues to fall. With Winona now below flood stage, the warning has been cancelled. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY FRIDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Mississippi River at Guttenberg Dam 10. * WHEN...Until early Friday afternoon. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 4:00 PM CDT Sunday the stage was 16.6 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 4:00 PM CDT Sunday was 17.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage Thursday evening and continue falling to 14.3 feet Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 16.6 feet on 04/20/1971. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional river and weather information is available at www.weather.gov/lacrosse. The next statement will be issued this evening.
